Reviews.Title: Good photos, easy interface, some drawbacks though.
Reviews.Author: Two kids mom "scienceteachermom"
Reviews.Content: This is a good camera for the price (sub 80) , with some issues.Positive pointsNice photos.Big screen for previewing.Easy to figure out, my 10 year old quickly learned to navigate the menus.Easy to download photos and video into XP,  just plug in the included cable (one of the tiny usb cables)Excellent red eye reduction, better than my Canon.Uses 2 AA batteries,  a big bonus since they are available everywhere.  We use rechargable Eneloop brand, they work well in digital cameras and hold their charge when stored.Negative pointsNo viewfinder, which makes it tough to see what you are taking in bright sunlight.No audio playback for video on the camera.  It does record the sound, but to hear it you have to download the video.A little slow between photos,  perhaps 5 seconds after a photo before it is ready to take another.  We are using a Kingston 2 GB SD Flash Memory Card, perhaps if you bought a faster card this might improve.

Reviews.Title: Awsome easy to use camera
Reviews.Author: Annette "Annette"
Reviews.Content: I am a first time mom, and as such, an easy to use camera is a must have.  This is easy to use but also gives you a nice quality. I have had people ask me if some of my photos were professional!  I also love the video feature, it makes it easy to make sure those precious moments get captured.

Reviews.Title: LCD screen
Reviews.Author: Cherry Trini
Reviews.Content: I like this camera for its size, however, the view from the LCD screen is dark for taking and reviewing pictures compared to some other cameras I have seen. Menu items are easy to review and pictures are easily downloadable and of good quality.

Reviews.Title: great camera!
Reviews.Author: L. Newland
Reviews.Content: This camera was for my daughter as a replacement for a broken camera. She loves it. The photo quality is good and it is easy to use.I would recommend this product!

Reviews.Title: Camera for my daughter
Reviews.Author: The Senior one "Mfg. Man."
Reviews.Content: My 12 year old daughter came to me with some money she had saved and asked to buy a camera. I looked and looked trying to find a pink camera at a good price, with all the features she wanted, and would last her for years to come. I am pleased to say this camera fit the bill. I was tickled to find out she needed very little instruction from me on its use and she was able to follow the directions for the install with no troubles. I had to help her with some trouble she had removing pictures a couple of times otherwise no issues with the camera itself.

Reviews.Title: Very Cute Camera
Reviews.Author: StyleMaven
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for my 14 year old niece for Christmas who loves the color pink. It's a very cute camera, very user friendly and my niece was able to figure out all of its inner workings immediately. The pictures seem a little dark compared to other cameras. Also, the batteries went dead about 15 minutes into usage. This is all before even purchasing a memory card. So far I've replaced the batteries 3 times. Other than that, for what it's worth it's pretty good.

Reviews.Title: It's my favorite camera
Reviews.Author: S. L. Bauer
Reviews.Content: This camera absolutely can't be beat for the price.And the color is beautiful. This is my fourth digital camera and the least expensive,but it's my favorite!

Reviews.Title: Good gift for teenager
Reviews.Author: Cathy D. Osborne "C. Osborne"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my daughter for christmas and she loves it! It takes good pictures for what she wants to do with it. I already have an easy share camera so she can use all my accesories and my easy share dock.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful Professional-like Photos!
Reviews.Author: NikkiJ "Ladybug208"
Reviews.Content: [...]. I love it so very much! The picture quality is unbelievable. The color is always rich. I can zoom in easily on a very small item such as a diamond ring and it shows every detail beautifully! It's like a HD camera. I always use Energizer Lithium batteries and I don't have to replace them for months! I buy the pack of batteries for only $[...] bucks at [...] (4 in a pack) and this camera only needs 2 batteries. I do not regret this purchase, not only for the price- but for the astounding quality images.

Reviews.Title: great while it lasted!
Reviews.Author: J. Consoomr "skubadivr"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this and went down to Costa Rica to snap pictures. I think it took excellent pictures, and a friend there begged me to sell it to them, so I did. But, I want to say, it was a great camera while I had it. I really liked the fact that I could put 2 AA batteries in it and not some battery pack that I had to charge. Just a matter of convenience, battery packs always die when you are somewhere without a spare or a way to recharge quickly. I travel quite frequently to third world countries and batteries are sometimes easier to locate than an electrical outlet.

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: R. Miles "tat2she_ra30"
Reviews.Content: Bought it new for $70 on here last year; would not pay more than $90 for it.  I love it, but wish the photo quality was better. It's not bad, but the last Kodak I had you could blow the pics up, and the quality would still be pretty good. Not with this cam.; 5x7 is pushing it. And no matter what setting I'm in, I still get a lot of red-eye. Easy to use and figure out though.

Reviews.Title: GREAT
Reviews.Author: Jessica Gomez
Reviews.Content: I LOVE THIS CAMERA, IT WAS CHEAP AND ITS AS NEW AS IF YOU WERE TO BUY IT AT BEST BUY. RECOMMEND TO BUY.

Reviews.Title: Happy
Reviews.Author: Alicia Farrar
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for personal use for my kids and I. I've been very pleased with this camera. I got to really test it out recently when my children and I went to the zoo. It's so easy to use and I love the image stabilization feature because with two kids in tow, it can be hard to take pictures that are not fuzzy. With this feature it's so much easier to get clear pictures. Also, when I purchased the camera it came with Kodak batteries, I was surprised how long they lasted. Mind you, I had been using the camera off and on to take pictures before we went to the zoo for six and a half hours and the batteries finally died after four hours of being there. After taking a ridiculous amount of pictures, 350 to be exact, the camera was on a lot. I did find turning it off whenever possible helps seemed to help with the life of the batteries. I'm very happy with my decision to get this camera.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Nicole Salisbury
Reviews.Content: bought this camera as a gift for my mother and she just loves it it takes beautiful pictures and if your hands shake you still can take the picture without ruining it

Reviews.Title: love this camera!
Reviews.Author: M. Busby "blessed Grandma"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my granddaughter and she is so excited as its fairly easy for her......and especially for me as I am technologically challenged in a big way:)  I wanted to get her something  I could help her with so we would both be able to use the camera  and she would feel comfortable enough with it so she could take it with her on school trips, etc.My only issue so far is that the markings on the battery slots look to be backward.  Actually, I was in the process of sending the camera back when I read a review that mentioned the same thing so I took the camera back out and put the batteries in the other way and it works beautifully.  The slot shows the - and + at the top which made me think that is where it would be ...on the top side.  Instead, the mark is there to let you know that is the end that goes down into the camera.  So it was a little  confusing as I had never seen one marked that way before.We did not return the camera and we are very pleased.  The pictures are so crisp in detail.  I felt it was a very good deal.

Reviews.Title: Regular Cam, Cheap Price...
Reviews.Author: Jhonnathan Rodriguez "J. Rodriguez"
Reviews.Content: It's the kind of product that You buy knowing You're not going to get a perfect perform but decent, the image is fine as well the system it's user friendly... it's just a regular cam, but with a very good price, so if You're looking for something like that go ahead and buy it...

Reviews.Title: no A/V connection.  No speaker for vids.
Reviews.Author: K. Warhover
Reviews.Content: A decent enough camera with two things that will bug you.  My old easyshare camera came with an RCA cable that plugged into the camera's tiny USB out.  this made for easy viewing on any TV.  The C813 does not and I don't think any of the new Easyshares do. Even if you take the cable from an older model and plug it into the C813's USB out, nothing happens.The other thing that bugs me about this camera is no speaker for playback of videos,  Maybe I've just been lucky, but all my old cameras had a speaker (if they shot vids).

Reviews.Title: Kodak Camera in good condition and ready to be used as a gift
Reviews.Author: Ron Walter
Reviews.Content: Make sure you also order the battery charger as they are difficult to locate. Also, download manual for product from Kodak.

Reviews.Title: Didn't last long!
Reviews.Author: Mary-Leah Moore
Reviews.Content: The LED screen on this camera cracked after less than a year. It's useless now and we had to trash it. Poor quality!!!

Reviews.Title: DONT BUY
Reviews.Author: shenellyxoxo
Reviews.Content: It's not worth your money. when i got the camera it had a bunch of marks and scratches and it had some sort of food product on it.it even had pictures from the previous owner on it! WTF! waste of money and time

Reviews.Title: Good while it lasted
Reviews.Author: Andrea
Reviews.Content: I got this camera for a trip to Asia. It worked beautifully. The pictures were clear, the response was quick. Buying a memory card is necessary because you would otherwise only have space for about 10 pictures. Unfortunately, I cannot give this camera more stars because it stopped working for no apparent reason after 1.5 years. Got new batteries several times, attempted to reset it but to no avail. Even contacted Kodak and they could offer no assistance. If you search online you could see that quite a few people had the same issue. The only explanation I could gather is that its just shoddily manufactured. I used to be pretty loyal to Kodak but now I dont trust their products anymore.

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera for the price.
Reviews.Author: C. Wright "Caroline"
Reviews.Content: Bought this off of Amazon, used.  Product was as described and arrived quickly.  We got it for my daughter for her birthday and it is very easy to use and understand.  I have used canon's and samsungs as handhelds in the past and I prefer this one.  It is a little more bulkier and and takes double A's but the picutre quality is good.  Nice for a beginners camera.

Reviews.Title: Great Purchase
Reviews.Author: Uscgirl005
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with this purchase. The seller delivered it on time and it was exactly as described. I plan to continue purchasing items from this seller. Great experience.

Reviews.Title: Nice, but LCD screen could be better
Reviews.Author: Mrs. G.
Reviews.Content: This camera was refurbished by an authorized Kodak repair center and came with a 1 year warranty so I figured it would be good as new.  But, I notice the quality of the LCD screen has much to be desired.  The dpi seems low, it has a matt finish and just seems cheap...I am assuming the screen has been replaced.  I am pretty sure it wasn't replaced with the exact LCD screen it originally had..  I wish I would've known that ahead of time.The camera is very easy to use though, and takes great pictures.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Product - Brand Spanking New!
Reviews.Author: T. Kendall "T.E. Kendall"
Reviews.Content: This Camera came brand spanking new, still in it's factory sealed packaging, and I got it at a better cost than I would have anywhere else.

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera
Reviews.Author: K. A. Holland
Reviews.Content: I purchased this Kodak camera for my 13 year old daughter. She loves the camera and the pink color is a nice touch. The photographs are clear, the camera is easy to use and the price is very affordable. We're both very pleased with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Kid's camera
Reviews.Author: 711runner
Reviews.Content: It wasn't clear that this product required non-reusable, non-chargable batteries. So not only is it not a "green" camera, it's a lot bigger than I expected due to accommodating the batteries. The time between pictures is ~15 seconds. That's a long time to wait to snap a second picture. I should have suspected something was wrong based on the $70 price tag. I don't like this camera and quickly gave it to my 6 year old neice. Even she mentioned that it takes a long time to take another picture.

Reviews.Title: Lasted 3 Days
Reviews.Author: P. Brady
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera as a Christmas present for my daughter and the Lens cover fails to open when I power the camera on.  Sending this one back for a refund!

Reviews.Title: WOW
Reviews.Author: B. Mcgee "senior babe"
Reviews.Content: What a deal and what customer service.  The product I ordered came exactly the way it was described.  I will buy from this seller in the future.

Reviews.Title: I love it...more than what I expected!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Charmaine Wyatt
Reviews.Content: Easy Share is not the word for it ....Easy to operator, easy to hold on to....sturdy buttons and frame!love it!!!1

ProductInfo.Features:
8.2-megapixel resolution for prints up to 30 x 40 inches
3x optical zoom, 5x digital zoom lens; digital image stabilization
2.4-inch color LCD screen
KODAK PERFECT TOUCH Technology
Capture images to SD/SDHC memory cards (not included)
ProductInfo.Name: Kodak EasyShare C813 8.2MP Digital Camera with 3x Optical Zoom (Pink)
